# ğŸ˜‹ æ”¯æŒVue2/3

    setup() {
      const text = 'Success'
      const log = () => console.log("ä½ å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘æ˜¯ Vue3 ğŸ˜„")
      return {
        log,

# ğŸ¤“ åŠ¨æ€ä¸»é¢˜

<template>
  <view :class="AppTheme">
    <text class="text-primary" @click="toggle">æˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŠ¨æ€ä¸»é¢˜ä¸‹çš„æŒ‰é’®</text>
  </view>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        theme: ''
      }
    },
    methods: {
      toggle() {
        const finalTheme = this.theme ? '' : 'deep'
        this.ToggleAppTheme(finalTheme)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
